blockquote-line.title: Blockquote Line
blockquote-line.description: A line of a quote pulled from an outside source.

checklist-item.title: Checklist Item
checklist-item.description: A checklist item represents an item in a checklist. It can be nested, and may or may not be checked.

required.name: level
required.description: The level of nesting of this checklist item, from 1 to 6

code-line.title: Code Line
code-line.description: A code line represents a line of code, typically in a block of other lines of code.

optional.name: language
optional.description: The language the code line is written in

heading.title: Heading
heading.description: A heading represents a line of heading text at a specific level, from one to six.

required.name: level
required.description: The level of heading this is, from 1 to 6

horizontal-rule.title: Horizontal Rule
horizontal-rule.description: A horizontal rule represents a visual horizontal separator in a document.

image.title: Image
image.description: An image represents a visual image embedded in a document.

optional.name: width
optional.description: The width, in pixels, of the image

optional.name: height
optional.description: The height, in pixels, of the image

optional.name: alt
optional.description: The alt text to display on top of the image

optional.name: uploadCacheID
optional.description: A UUID identifying an image being uploaded

link-definition.title: Link Definition
link-definition.description: A line that defines a link referred to elsewhere in the document.

required.name: name
required.description: The name of this link definition

required.name: url
required.description: The URL that this link points to

ordered-list-item.title: Ordered List Item
ordered-list-item.description: An ordered list item represents an item in a list whose order is important.

required.name: level
required.description: The level of nesting of this list item, from 1 to 6

title.title: Title
title.description: The title of a document, which comes from a level 1 header at the very beginning of parsed Markdown, if one is present.

required.name: version
required.description: The version of the CanvasNative format this document uses

unordered-list-item.title: Unordered List Item
unordered-list-item.description: An unordered list item represents an item in an unordered list.

required.name: level
required.description: The level of nesting of this list item, from 1 to 6
